com.adobe.cq.commerce.api.promotion

Class PromotionInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.commerce.api.promotion.PromotionInfo

  • public class PromotionInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A POJO which provides information about an applied promotion (including its status and any applied discount).
    Since:
    5.6

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PromotionInfo.PromotionStatus
      Status of an applied promotion in the context of a user's cart or order.

    • Constructor Summary

      Deprecated. 
      since 6.0; use PromotionInfo(String, String, PromotionStatus, String, String, Integer) instead

      Instantiate a new PromotionInfo.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PromotionInfo

        public PromotionInfo(java.lang.String path,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     PromotionInfo.PromotionStatus status,
                     java.lang.String description,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     java.lang.Integer cartEntryIndex)
        Instantiate a new PromotionInfo.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the promotion if represented in the repository. Otherwise, an ID uniquely identifying the promotion.
        title - An author-oriented title.
        status - See PromotionInfo.PromotionStatus.
        description - An author-oriented description of the promotion (and its current status).
        message - A shopper-oriented message regarding the current status of the promotion.
        cartEntryIndex - The index of the cart entry this promotion applies to, or null for order-specific promotions.

      • PromotionInfo

        @Deprecated
public PromotionInfo(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String title,
                                 PromotionInfo.PromotionStatus status,
                                 java.lang.String message)
        Deprecated. since 6.0; use PromotionInfo(String, String, PromotionStatus, String, String, Integer) instead

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Get the path or identifier.

      • getStatus

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        An author-oriented description of the current status of the promotion.

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        A shopper-oriented message regarding the current status of the promotion.

      • getCartEntryIndex

        public java.lang.Integer getCartEntryIndex()
        Get a cart entry's index in case the promotion is related to a specific cart line item, e.g. discount for seasonal products. For order-level promotions, this method returns null.
